level.text: The recommendations of the review panel and the award decisions of the Director shall be based on the following criteria:
Soundness of research design, statistical technique, procedures, and methodology, if appropriate;
Theoretical and technical soundness of the proposed plan of operation including the extent to which:
The objectives of the proposed project are clearly defined and clearly stated;
The proposed project activities appear likely to reach objectives;
The proposed project would contribute to the achievement of the grant’s stated policy objectives; and
Provisions are made for adequate evaluation of the effectiveness of the project and for determining the extent to which the objectives are accomplished;
Sufficiency of size, scope, and duration of the project to secure productive results;
Expertise to perform the work, including past performance;
Reasonableness of estimated cost in relation to anticipated results; and
Other factors as identified in writing by the Director prior to the award of the grant
